translation.en: WOMAN ON PA: Welcome to Wichita Mid-Continent Airport.
Convenient, friendly, affordable.
translation.zh: 舒适 亲切 价格适中

translation.en: Fly with us.
translation.zh: 带给您一段舒心的旅程

translation.en: Please note, the Kansas Clean Air Act has designated this airport as non-smoking.
translation.zh: 请注意 此机场乃非吸烟场所

translation.en: Your attention, please. Baggage claim is located
translation.zh: 乘客请注意 行李领取处设于

translation.en: on the east side of the terminal.
Hotel and ground transportation information boards
and public telephones are located opposite the baggage carousels.
Ladies and gentlemen, please maintain visual contact
with your personal property at all times.
Please do not leave your baggage or other items unattended.
translation.zh: 请将行李放于视线范围

translation.en: Thank you for your cooperation.
So, I'm gonna make it onto the earlier flight, right?
translation.zh: -打搅一下-对不起 可以搭早点那趟航班吗？

translation.en: Are you gonna check that?
translation.zh: 可以搭早点那趟航班吗？

translation.en: No, I'm gonna carry it on. It's got valuables in it.
translation.zh: 要寄行李么？ 不用 手提行了 贵重物品

translation.en: Here you are. Thank you.
God, excuse me. No, I'm sorry.
That bag is wicked heavy, anyhow.
I was looking at my phone. I hate it when people do that.
translation.zh: 我的袋子太重了 我不该光顾着看手机

translation.en: You have a little
smudge.
What are these?
Those are two barrel carburetors for a Pontiac Tri-Power.
translation.zh: 庞蒂克高性能双腔化油器

translation.en: Those are exhaust tips for a '74 Z-28.
I restore old cars, so...
Hair-dryer. (LAUGHS)
(EXCLAIMS) Oh, my God, I'm so sorry.
This is getting to be a habit.
(CHUCKLING) Yeah, it is.
Sorry about that.
Thank you. Yeah.
Thank you. Yeah, sure.
Boston?
Yeah.
Gate 12.
Enjoy your flight, Mr. Garcia. Thank you.
translation.zh: 旅途愉快 贾西先生

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 旅途愉快 贾西先生 你好

translation.en: I'm sorry. You're not on this flight.
Well, I just checked in for this one, like, 10 minutes ago.
That must be some sort of mistake.
I'm sorry, the computer shows that we're booked.
Listen, Sharry.
Tomorrow my little sister's getting married.
translation.zh: 我妹明天结婚 我一手带大她…

translation.en: I practically raised her. SHARRY: I'm sorry, we are completely sold out.
translation.zh: 我妹明天结婚 我一手带大她… 对不起 这航班满了

translation.en: JUNE: Listen, can you help me out for a second? She's my little sister.
translation.zh: 求你帮帮忙 我妹爱普

translation.en: She's April, I'm June,
translation.zh: 求你帮帮忙 我妹爱普 她等着我陪她进入教堂

translation.en: she's counting on me to march her down the aisle tomorrow.
translation.zh: 她等着我陪她进入教堂

translation.en: That's very sweet,
but the 11:50 will get you there tomorrow morning with plenty of time.
Your boarding pass, sir?
Sometimes things happen for a reason.
Enjoy your flight, Mr. Miller.
translation.zh: 旅途愉快 米勒先生

translation.en: Thank you.
WOMAN ON PA: This is the final boarding call for US Midland Air, flight 77
translation.zh: 美联航空77号班机往波士顿

translation.en: non-stop service to Boston's Logan Airport, now boarding at gate 12.
Would all passengers holding a valid boarding pass, please proceed...
translation.zh: 12号闸登机 最后召集 请准备好登机证

translation.en: FITZGERALD: I should've seen it coming, boss.
translation.zh: 请准备好登机证 我应该预料到 他会发疯失控

translation.en: He went on tilt, he came undone.
translation.zh: 我应该预料到 他会发疯失控

translation.en: Coming undone in our business means you need a margarita.
translation.zh: 我应该预料到 他会发疯失控 失控就去喝酒

translation.en: It doesn't mean capping a dozen people
translation.zh: 失控就去喝酒 而不是炸实验室杀死十几人

translation.en: in a government lab and blowing it up.
translation.zh: 而不是炸实验室杀死十几人

translation.en: It doesn't mean stealing an object of critical importance.
translation.zh: 而不是炸实验室杀死十几人 又或者盗取极重要的东西

translation.en: Does he have the Zephyr or not? We believe so.
translation.zh: 又或者盗取极重要的东西 微风电池在他手里？ 我想是

translation.en: Uh-huh. You believe so.
(WHISPERING) Check it out. I don't care what you believe, Fitz.
I need you to clean your mess up. Go back and play it again.
translation.zh: 不管你想什么 -给我搞掂它-回放

translation.en: I want the Zephyr.
We'll have it in hand by the time he lands in Boston.
translation.zh: 他飞抵波士顿时便可取回

translation.en: Find out who and what she is.
Should I have the field office pick her up in Wichita?
Umm-mmm. I got a better idea.
translation.zh: 找威奇塔同事捉拿她？ 我有办法

translation.en: Miss Havens? We did find a seat for you.
(LOUIE LOUIE RINGTONE PLAYING)
We apologize for the delay.
translation.zh: 各位乘客 抱歉延误

translation.en: We will be departing Wichita Airport shortly.
translation.zh: 我们即将离开威奇塔国际机场 （移动中）

translation.en: Thanks for your patience.
JUNE: I know it's policy or whatever and it's just your job,
but it's kind of lame.
SHARRY: Again, I apologize.
Fitz. What did you do?
It's no wonder these airlines are going out of business. ATTENDANT: We have been cleared onto the runway.
translation.zh: 难怪这些航空公司倒闭

translation.en: There's nobody on the plane.
MALE ATTENDANT: The captain has turned on the "fasten seatbelt" sign.
translation.zh: 本次航班机长提醒各位

translation.en: Please remain seated until the sign has been turned off
translation.zh: 请扣紧安全带直至指示灯熄灭

translation.en: and it's safe to move about the cabin.
I'm June, by the way.
I'm Roy Miller.
It's very nice to meet you.
STEWARDESS: Tequila on the rocks?
Yeah. Just in time, thanks.
So, your sister's getting married tomorrow?
Excuse me? Your sister.
She's getting married tomorrow. Congratulations.
translation.zh: -什么？-你妹妹 明天结婚 恭喜

translation.en: Oh. Yeah, thanks.
translation.zh: 明天结婚 恭喜 噢 谢谢

translation.en: You know, Roy, I'm a bad liar.
translation.zh: 罗伊 其实我不太会说谎话

translation.en: I'm sorry, how's that?
April is getting married, but not till Saturday.
translation.zh: 妹妹是结婚 不过在星期六

translation.en: You had me fooled.
Well, I do have a fitting tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我明天要试衣服才是真的

translation.en: So, I do, actually, have to go home.
I hope this isn't gonna be a rough flight.
(MUTTERING) It might be.
Wichita is a long way to go for a carburetor.
translation.zh: 去威奇塔那么远找化油器 不简单

translation.en: It's not just any carburetor. It's a triple deuce.
translation.zh: 不是普通化油器 是三重

translation.en: Oh. I'm restoring a '66 GTO.
And Kansas has the best scrap.
Really?
My dad had a garage,
and when I was a kid, he bought this chassis.
translation.zh: 我爸开汽车维修店 他买了这车

translation.en: He used to take us to yards, and search for parts, you know?
translation.zh: 经常带我去废车场找零件

translation.en: He died in '98, and now that April's getting married,
I just figured, why not finish it up,
give it to her sort of as a wedding present?
Kind of like a present from our dad, too, you know?
That's nice.
Yeah. Yeah.
I used to think that (SIGHS)
someday, when the last part went in,
translation.zh: 有一天 当最后的零件装配好…

translation.en: I would just climb into that GTO and start it up.
translation.zh: 我会跳上车 开动它…

translation.en: Just drive and drive and drive, and just keep driving
until I got to the tip of South America.
Cape Horn. Yeah.
There's beautiful islands down there.
Yeah?
Pirate islands. (LAUGHS)
Yeah, "someday." That's a dangerous word.
translation.zh: 有一天 这字眼很危险

translation.en: Dangerous?
It's really just code for "never."
I think a lot about things I haven't done.
translation.zh: 我常想到我还未做的事

translation.en: Dive in the Great Barrier Reef. Ride the Orient Express.
translation.zh: 到大堡礁潜水 乘东方快车

translation.en: Live on the Amalfi Coast with nothing but a motorcycle and a backpack.
translation.zh: 背背包开摩托车到爱马菲海岸

translation.en: Kiss a stranger on the balcony of the Hotel Du Cap.
translation.zh: 在杜开普酒店的露台和陌生人接吻

translation.en: Where is that?
South of France.
What about you? What's your list?
Well, yours sounds pretty good.
Wow.
Thanks.
It's no problem.
I'll just put this up here, if that's all right.
You know what?
I'm gonna go back and use the restroom.
I'll help you. Thanks.
Lots of turbulence, huh?
I'll be out in a minute. Sure.
"Kiss a stranger on the balcony of the Hotel Du Cap"?
translation.zh: 杜开普酒店露台和陌生人接吻？

translation.en: I mean, what kind of a line is that?
I mean, it's, like, a really good line.
Ma'am? Ma'am?
Did you see his hands, by any chance?
They just, like, snatched that bag right out of the air.
Lightning-fast reflexes.
Not cool.
Okay.
This will help.
Ocupado.
Enough. It's over, Roy.
translation.zh: 好 玩完了 罗伊

translation.en: Yeah, I agree. Enough.
translation.zh: 是 我同意 玩完

translation.en: Where's the Zephyr?
Why is the girl on the plane? Tell me.
translation.zh: 那女子为什么在此？说啊

translation.en: Why did Fitz put her on the plane?
Don't move, Miller.
So what are you gonna do? What are you gonna do?
translation.zh: 好 你打算怎样做？ 怎样做？放过这大好机会？

translation.en: You're just gonna let this opportunity pass you by?
translation.zh: 怎样做？放过这大好机会？

translation.en: No, of course you're not.
You're gonna walk through that door, and get it right.
translation.zh: 出去搞定他 又不是没试过

translation.en: It's not your first rodeo, woman.
(SOFTLY) Hey.
I decided to join you.
I'm sorry. I...
No, no, don't... It's great. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -不 没关系 很好-抱歉

translation.en: It's just, like, the tequila and the altitude and everything.
translation.zh: -不 没关系 很好-抱歉 只因喝了酒 气流及…

translation.en: There's something I've gotta tell you.
What? Oh, my God, you're in a relationship. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 噢 你有女朋友 很对不起

translation.en: No, no, no. That's not it.
Okay, I'm all ears. What is it?
Are we landing?
No, not yet. Uh...
No?
Listen, there's no need to panic. I have...
translation.zh: 听着 不要惊慌 我已…控制大局

translation.en: contained the situation.
Situation?
Yeah. We've lost the pilots.
Where did they go?
I mean, they're dead.
The pilots are dead. Shot. It's...
Shot?
By who?
Well, me.
Actually, I shot the first pilot.
He shot the second pilot accidentally. It's just
translation.zh: 而他错手射中副机师 算是

translation.en: one of those things.
Seriously, this is great!
Really, I'm relieved you are taking this so well.
Where are you going?
I'm just gonna go check on things and think about landing.
translation.zh: 去驾驶舱看看 想办法降落

translation.en: Would you mind putting your seatbelt on for me?
That would be great. Yeah.
This is weird.
MILLER: Mayday. Mayday. This is US Midland Air 77 heavy.
What's happening? Everybody's dead out there!
translation.zh: 怎么了？ 所有人都死掉

translation.en: Come on in. Sit down. Mayday, mayday, mayday.
Everybody's dead in here. MILLER: I'm declaring an emergency.
translation.zh: 求救！ -全部死掉了-我在发布紧急讯号

translation.en: Oh, my God! Are we going down? I'm sorry?
translation.zh: -全部死掉了-我在发布紧急讯号 -惨！要撞了？-什么？

translation.en: Are we going down?
No, June, it's just a rapid descent. Please, sit down.
translation.zh: 要撞了？ 不 茱恩 只是急降 请坐好

translation.en: MAN ON RADIO: Please state your emergency, Midland 77.
translation.zh: 不 茱恩 只是急降 请坐好

translation.en: I'm sorry, I think I've heard enough of this guy.
translation.zh: 不想再听这家伙的废话

translation.en: Are you a pilot? Who are you?
The shoulder straps.
You can put those over, and it clicks in right down there.
You wanna click it right there, that's it.
Okay, I got it, I got it. Okay...
Gear down, showdown.
Why can't we just land in an airport?
No, no, that wouldn't be a good idea.
They'll be waiting for us.
What do you mean? Waiting for us? Who?
I think the less you know, the better.
What?
MILLER: Okay, we're gonna touch down here.
That's a truck. That's a truck! Yeah.
That's a truck! Yup.
JUNE: Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
That's a curve. That's a curve! I see it. I see it.
Oh, my God!
Oh, God!
Okay, this is good.
JUNE: What's good?
Take a sip of that.
It'll take the edge off.
Are you shot?
Yeah, how about that?
It's just a scrape. That's good news.
translation.zh: 只是皮外伤 好消息

translation.en: June, we have to
discuss what's gonna happen next.
You need to go to the hospital. Prison, maybe?
translation.zh: 送你去医院 或者去监狱？

translation.en: Some people are gonna come looking for you now. Bad people.
translation.zh: 有人会前来找你 坏人

translation.en: You know, I feel a little weird.
Yeah, that'll pass once you fall asleep, which should be in a couple of minutes.
translation.zh: 睡着了便没事 等多几分钟

translation.en: What? I need you to listen, June.
Did you drug me?
Yes.
You drugged me. Yeah, it's for your own good.
Now, look. These bad people who are going to come and see you, they're gonna ask you about me. Okay?
translation.zh: 那些坏人会来问你我的事

translation.en: And you need to tell them you don't know me.
June? June? Okay.
You need to tell them you don't remember anything.
And you need to avoid getting in any vehicle with them at all costs.
translation.zh: 无论如何 不要坐他们的车

translation.en: Okay, who are "them"?
Well, they're serious people, June.
They'll probably identify themselves as federal agents, and they'll DIP you.
translation.zh: 可能自称联邦密探 来骗你

translation.en: Dip me? In what?
Dis-Information Protocol. They'll tell you a story about me.
translation.zh: 说谎来骗你 关于我的

translation.en: About how I'm mentally unstable, paranoid.
How I'm violent and dangerous, and it'll all sound very convincing.
translation.zh: 是危险人物 弄到像真的一样

translation.en: I'm already convinced.
There's a few common DIP keywords to listen for.
Reassuring words. Words like, "stabilize," "secure," "safe."
translation.zh: 好似“安定” “保护”“安全”之类

translation.en: If they say these words, particularly with repetition...
translation.zh: 好似“安定” “保护”“安全”之类 若他们不停说这些

translation.en: Okay.
...it means they're going to kill you.
Oh, God!
translation.zh: 天啊！ 或者送你去荒岛一段时间

translation.en: Or intern you somewhere offshore for a very long time.
translation.zh: 或者送你去荒岛一段时间

translation.en: Okay? Okay.
Now, stay with me. If they tell you you're safe...
translation.zh: 听着 若他们说你安全…

translation.en: If they tell me I'm safe,
they're gonna kill me.
Don't get in what?
Vehicles.
Any vehicles. Okay, any vehicles.
translation.zh: 任何车 好 任何车

translation.en: Just run. I'll run.
Run. Run.
And if they ask you about me... Uh-huh.
I don't know you. I don't know you at all.
Who are you, Roy?
good for ski country, but probably...
Now, back to our top news story of the morning.
Here's Bradley Moss, with an on-the-scene report.
translation.zh: 我是毕利 现场报导

translation.en: MOSS: According to FAA sources, at approximately 7:30 last night,
translation.zh: 民航处透露 昨晚7：30左右

translation.en: all contact was lost with a Boston-bound commuter jet from Wichita.
translation.zh: 与飞往波士顿客机失去联络

translation.en: The plane was passing through turbulence
and may have met up with wind shear
translation.zh: 很明显客机遇上气流 甚至乱流或雷击 导致机件故障

translation.en: or a lightning storm. (POUNDING ON DOOR)
translation.zh: 甚至乱流或雷击 导致机件故障

translation.en: Now, this is all conjecture at this point,
as all that's left is a crater in an Indiana cornfield.
translation.zh: 现阶段只有猜测 只剩下一个大坑在印第安纳州

translation.en: Coming!
Rodney?
Oh! Thank God. I wanted to make sure you were okay.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 你没事吧

translation.en: Yeah, why?
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 你没事吧 没事 为什么？

translation.en: You were on that flight from Kansas, right?
Yeah. I saw on the news about the crash.
translation.zh: -你乘搭那航班？-是 看到撞机新闻

translation.en: What news? What crash?
Anyway, you're alive.
I'm alive, yeah.
Sure, that's cool. Hey, but, June, you know...
translation.zh: 我看到 真好 不过 茱恩

translation.en: I told myself that if I found you alive,
translation.zh: 我跟自己说如果你没事

translation.en: that I was gonna ask you to dinner.
How about I call you later, okay?
JUNE: It's just another day. It's just a normal day. Okay.
translation.zh: 正正常常 普普通通过今天

translation.en: She's moving.
APRIL: Wow!
And gotta love the boots.
Yeah, you know.
I promise I'll wear heels on the day.
Hey. Can I talk to you for a second? Yeah.
So, this weekend, I was thinking about Dad's GTO.
Really?
Yeah, it's just sitting there.
And I was wondering how you would feel about maybe selling it.
translation.zh: 倒不如卖了它 你说好吗？

translation.en: You wanna sell Dad's GTO?
Ben and I, we really want our own place.
Excuse me?
Excuse me. Anyone here belong to that blue truck parked outside?
translation.zh: 外面那蓝色货车是谁的？

translation.en: Yeah, why?
You're about to get a ticket.
Thought I put enough quarters in there. Yeah.
I hate getting tickets.
Ooh! Excuse me.
Please step inside, miss.
Uh... Let me just go grab a few things.
Miss Havens, good afternoon. Special Agent-in-Charge, Fitzgerald.
translation.zh: 你好 海温丝小姐 我是密探菲茨 麻烦你上车？

translation.en: Will you join us inside the car for a moment?
translation.zh: 我是密探菲茨 麻烦你上车？

translation.en: We know you were on the flight with him last night.
translation.zh: 昨晚你跟他一起在机上

translation.en: The one that crashed.
Who are you again?
FBI. You do know Mr. Miller.
translation.zh: 联邦密探 你认识米勒先生？

translation.en: No, I don't.
Well, we chatted a little bit before security, but...
translation.zh: 这个嘛… 入闸前聊了两句 但…

translation.en: I see. And once you were on the flight,
translation.zh: 明白 上机后又怎样？

translation.en: what happened then? More chatting?
translation.zh: 明白 上机后又怎样？ 继续聊？

translation.en: Is this funny to you? No.
He's dangerous, Miss Havens, and out of control.
He said that you'd say he was crazy.
translation.zh: 他说你会说他神经错乱

translation.en: So, you did talk to him. And about me, no less.
translation.zh: 那么你有跟他谈 说起我

translation.en: No. No, not you, specifically.
About whom, then?
Simon Feck?
I don't know who that is.
Look, this is getting really twisted around,
and I think I should probably call a lawyer.
We're gonna take you to a secure location, Miss Havens, until Miller is contained.
translation.zh: 带你去个安全的地方直至米勒被擒

translation.en: Someplace safe.
With you? Yes, ma'am.
JUNE: You wanna tell me where we're going?
Fellas? Don't worry, miss, you're safe.
translation.zh: 放心 小姐 你很安全

translation.en: Excuse me?
You're safe with us.
I wanna know where we're going.
Just a shortcut till the situation is stabilized.
translation.zh: 走捷径 直至情况稳定

translation.en: We'll keep you safe. (TIRES SCREECHING)
You said that already. Because I meant it.
translation.zh: 你说过 因为我说真的

translation.en: AGENT: What is Jackson doing?
Shooter! Shooter! Evade! Evade! Shooter on the freeway.
translation.zh: 枪手！回避！公路上有个枪手！

translation.en: The dot's on your back!
(TIRES SCREECHING)
Follow me, now!
Are you insane? I'm not going out that door!
(SCREAMING) Oh, my God!
Get your foot off...
Oh, my God! Hey, June!
I can't see! You are doing great.
I can't see! Get out of the way!
Open the door.
translation.zh: 闪开！ -开车门-我无法把他的脚移开

translation.en: I can't get his foot off the gas. Open the door, June.
translation.zh: -开车门-我无法把他的脚移开

translation.en: Open the door, June. That's a beautiful dress, by the way.
translation.zh: -我不行！-开门！茱恩！ -我看不到-裙子很漂亮哦！

translation.en: (SCREAMING) One second.
Oh, my God!
WOMAN: I totally know what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 我明白你意思 我都闷到受不了

translation.en: It's so boring, I can't even stand it. Totally.
translation.zh: 我明白你意思 我都闷到受不了 没错

translation.en: Thank you.
Who are you?
Oh, God!
What are you doing?
Hi, June. Move out of the way, I can't see!
translation.zh: -你好 茱恩-闪开 我看不到

translation.en: Please unlock the door, June.
translation.zh: -你好 茱恩-闪开 我看不到 开车门 茱恩

translation.en: Unlock the door. That way, I can help you.
I can't let go! You need to let go, June.
June, door! Got it!
translation.zh: 茱恩 开门！ 搞定

translation.en: Just pull over! Oh, my God!
Come on. Come on. Come on. Yup, come over here.
Right over here. Just stay down, you're doing good.
translation.zh: 这边 趴下 很好

translation.en: Here, hold this. Well, well, well.
Check this out.
Nice.
These guys are loaded for bear.
You're doing well, June.
Excellent driving. Over a dead guy, no less.
translation.zh: 好技术 踩着尸体开车

translation.en: You're a natural.
That's a beautiful dress.
Is that for April's wedding? Uh-huh.
Saturday? Yeah.
Yeah, that will be nice. Yeah.
(GASPING) Please, stop shooting people, okay?
translation.zh: 求你不要再杀人 好吗？

translation.en: Just stop shooting people.
I understand.
You're in shock.
How about you stay here
while I go have a word with the guys in the tunnel.
Okay? Okay.
translation.zh: 我去隧道跟他们谈？ 好

translation.en: Okay? Okay.
Actually, I'm just gonna go shoot them. I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 其实是去搞定他们 很快回来

translation.en: By the way, your timing when you opened that door...
Okay. ...was sublime.
You saved us, I hope you know that.
translation.zh: 救了我们 我想你知道

translation.en: You saved us. Okay.
Hey, wait!
Wait! Wait! Wait!
Oh, no.
Excuse me, sorry.
There you are.
MILLER: June?
June?
Rodney?
MAN: He's in the gym. Over there.
Hey! Hey!
What are you doing here?
Whoa! That's a... Hey, guys, say hello to June. That's a dress.
translation.zh: 各位 她是茱恩 裙子很美

translation.en: Thanks.
Everything all right? Yeah.
No, it's...
It's complicated.
You know what? I've been feeling the same way.
You wanna talk?
Maybe over some pie?
My point is...
My point is, that plane crash made me think about our break-up.
You know, this bulb went off, bing!
"Rodney, why are you giving up? You're being passive."
"Getting back at her because she didn't want the ring."
"So June didn't want to be engaged right now,
translation.zh: 她拒绝你 活该她撞机

translation.en: "and that freaks your mom out. Big deal!
"What about all the things you and June wanted to do together, huh?"
translation.zh: 我妈妈发疯 又如何！ 你们想一起做的事呢？”

translation.en: Our list, you know?
translation.zh: 你们想一起做的事呢？” 记得吗？

translation.en: Like camping in Vermont with my brother and Sheila in their new Winnie.
translation.zh: 与我哥嫂去佛蒙特露营

translation.en: Tickets to Blue Man Group, the battlegrounds tour.
I wanna talk about the plane crash. Okay?
translation.zh: 我想谈谈撞机 可以吗？

translation.en: Sure, what about it?
I was on it. I mean, in it.
translation.zh: 我在机上 我指 机内

translation.en: I mean, I was in it.
So you were in the plane crash?
translation.zh: 我指 机上 你在那机上？

translation.en: I wasn't supposed to be on that plane, but I was on it,
and there was this guy who was some sort of secret agent or something, and he...
translation.zh: 有个男人 貌似特工的男人

translation.en: He killed everybody on board.
And then he landed the plane. Next thing you know,
translation.zh: 然后把飞机降落 接下来

translation.en: I wake up, I'm in my room. I have no idea how I got there.
translation.zh: 在房间醒来 什么也记不起

translation.en: He must've drugged me or something. Then I go to April's fitting,
translation.zh: 他定是下了药 之后去试衣服

translation.en: because I have to wear this ridiculous dress.
These other guys, these other agents come, they snatch me up.
translation.zh: 另外几个特工来绑走我

translation.en: Next thing you know, I'm in "Grand Theft Auto" on the I-93.
translation.zh: 接下来 93公路上亡命飞车

translation.en: Why are you touching my hand?
Because I'm here for you.
Jeez, you are so stressed out! Well, yeah!
And I get it. Really?
I completely understand. I mean...
Wow, June. I know.
Your little sister's getting married... It's like...
...and that is stressful. What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你压力很大 什么？你根本没听我说

translation.en: You didn't even listen to what I was talking about.
translation.zh: 什么？你根本没听我说 我有 换了我也一样

translation.en: No, I did. Look, I would probably be the same way in that situation.
translation.zh: 我有 换了我也一样

translation.en: What can I do to help? Setting up? We can bring the guys over...
translation.zh: 让我来帮忙 布置场地？ 不

translation.en: No, no, no. Okay.
Oh, Christ.
Hi, June. Look, I...
I'm sorry if I'm interrupting anything, but...
I'm Roy Miller.
Rodney Burris.
Rodney, hi. How are you?
We're running out of time, and maybe I didn't make it clear enough,
translation.zh: 时间无多 或者我没说清楚

translation.en: but we're gonna have to stick together for a little bit,
translation.zh: 时间无多 或者我没说清楚 我们要一齐上路 由于…

translation.en: because of our...
translation.zh: 我们要一齐上路 由于…

translation.en: You know, our situation.
In case you didn't notice, Rodney is a fireman, okay?
translation.zh: 你可知道 朗尼是消防员

translation.en: So he's perfectly capable of handling any situation that comes up.
translation.zh: 他有能力应付任何情况

translation.en: Thank you very much, you can leave us alone.
I have no doubt.
Ever since I was a little kid, I have great respect for firemen.
translation.zh: 从小我便很尊敬消防员

translation.en: I appreciate it. Fact of the matter is,
translation.zh: 从小我便很尊敬消防员 谢谢

translation.en: I don't think you guys get paid enough. Yeah, we don't.
translation.zh: 薪水没理由那么低 的确是

translation.en: You're in Engine 10.
Yeah, Engine 10.
Yeah. Have you taken your lieutenant's exam yet?
I'm working on it.
Yeah? How's that going?
It's a bitch.
Did you ever do a tour in that hall, what is it?
Oh, Grove Hall, that's where the action is.
translation.zh: 你试试去做你就知道 我那间消防局很旺

translation.en: It's the fastest way up the ladder.
Rodney! House of Flames!
I often thought I...
I should have been a fireman.
(SOFTLY) Rodney, this is the guy.
What?
This is the guy. What? "This is the guy"?
I'm sorry, who are you?
I'm the guy?
I'm the guy. This is the guy. This is the guy.
This is the guy. I'm a guy.
I'm the guy. You are a guy.
I'm a guy. JUNE: He's the guy! He's the guy!
Rodney, whatever happens... God.
translation.zh: 朗尼 无论发生何事…

translation.en: Please, for your own safety... Rodney, whatever happens,
translation.zh: -为你安全着想-朗尼 无论发生何事…

translation.en: you should know... ...please stay in the booth.
What are you talking about?
JUNE: Wait!
Everybody! Everybody get down.
Get down, down, down! Everybody down.
Rodney, get down, or I will blow her head off.
translation.zh: 朗尼 趴下 否则我射爆她的头

translation.en: I'll blow her head off.
(PATRONS SCREAMING) What did I say?
Rodney, what did I say?
Just calm down, buddy. Answer! Huh?
Sorry, I thought you were making a move.
translation.zh: 对不起 以为你想阻止我

translation.en: Sorry. It's all right, I thought he was making a move.
translation.zh: 没事了 我以为他想阻止我

translation.en: Making a little pie. Pies for everybody. Everybody.
translation.zh: 去整馅饼 请大家吃

translation.en: Everybody gets pies, okay? No ice cream, a la mode.
translation.zh: 人人有份 不要加雪糕

translation.en: Weakens the legs, people. Lincoln knew it. It's why they got to him.
translation.zh: 令脚酸软 林肯都中过招 所以被杀

translation.en: No one follows us, or I kill myself and then her. (JUNE SCREAMING)
translation.zh: 别跟来 否则先杀自己再杀她

translation.en: Get in the car. Please. No.
Watch your head.
We're at 560 Harris. They're getting into a blue Volvo.
translation.zh: 夏利路560 他们上了蓝色富豪

translation.en: Rodney! Rodney! Rodney?
Oh, my God! Rodney!
It's okay. Look at me.
Okay. Look at me, it's okay. Shit!
I shot you through and through. No bone, nowhere near the femoral artery, okay? All right?
translation.zh: 我射得利落 没中骨头或股动脉

translation.en: This is gonna be better for you than Grove Hall. It's all good.
translation.zh: 可能升得更快 没事

translation.en: Okay? You good? Good? Good.
Good?
There were four security cameras in that restaurant, June.
translation.zh: 餐厅内有四部闭路电视

translation.en: Now there is proof you're my hostage.
translation.zh: 餐厅内有四部闭路电视 证明你如今被我胁持

translation.en: So we've cleared your name, with the locals, at least.
You know? It's a start. Something to build on.
translation.zh: 起码还你清白 之后会逐步令你安全

translation.en: You shot Rodney!
Yeah, I did.
But I asked him to stay in the booth.
You shot Rodney!
It might be the best thing that ever happened to him.
Yeah, right, because we all should get shot every now and then!
translation.zh: 是嘛 人人都会被射中

translation.en: Rodney... Rodney is a good guy, June.
But not really right for you.
I mean, you know, in my opinion. But a good guy.
translation.zh: 这是我意见 他是个好人

translation.en: Took a bullet, he's gonna be a hero. Probably get a promotion.
translation.zh: 挨了子弹 肯定变英雄 甚至升职

translation.en: Stop the car. Stop the car. What?
Stop the car. Stop the car. Stop the car. Just stop the car!
June, I understand you want off the carousel.
translation.zh: 我明白 你不想再玩

translation.en: I do, I wanna get off the carousel. Please, Roy.
translation.zh: 是 我不想再玩 罗伊 请停车 马上呀！

translation.en: Can you stop the car, please? Right now!
translation.zh: 罗伊 请停车 马上呀！

translation.en: I'm not one of those "I told you so" kind of guys,
but I did warn you to stay off the plane last night.
translation.zh: 我有警告你别搭那班机

translation.en: When?
Well, when I said, "Sometimes things happen for a reason."
That's not a warning. That's not a warning, Roy!
translation.zh: 那不算 那不算警告

translation.en: That's like a needlepoint expression or a bumper sticker.
translation.zh: 像口头禅或卖广告多点

translation.en: Next time, try, "June, if you get on this plane, you will fucking die!"
translation.zh: 下次说“茱恩 搭那班机你死定了”

translation.en: Huh? You know, Roy, maybe they meant it when they said that I would be safe.
translation.zh: 罗伊 跟他们走可能真的安全

translation.en: You really mean that, June?
Yeah!
Did you feel safe with them?
Safer than I do now!
Okay, okay. All right.
Just so you understand,
right now, out there, on your own, your life expectancy is like here.
translation.zh: 如今你走出去生存机会只有这么低

translation.en: With me, it's here. Without me, here.
translation.zh: 有我 这么高 没我 这么低

translation.en: With me, without me. With me, without me.
So...
I wouldn't advise going home. But, you know, it's up to you.
translation.zh: 你自己决定吧 我不勉强你

translation.en: So right now I need another car, keep moving.
translation.zh: 要找过辆车 继续上路

translation.en: Someone else is depending on me. Someone whose life is in danger.
Someone who trusts me. Every second I waste chasing you,
translation.zh: 一个相信我的人 越浪费时间追你

translation.en: I'm letting him down.
WOMAN ON TV: Rodney, why did you make this brave call to leap into action?
translation.zh: 朗尼 为何奋不顾身？

translation.en: RODNEY ON TV: Well, I didn't think.
translation.zh: 朗尼 为何奋不顾身？ 自然反应吧

translation.en: I just did what any man would do in that situation, you know?
I leapt into action. Thanks.
Like you said, it's really the job.
You should be so proud.
Thanks. Good job.
translation.zh: 你该引以为荣 -过奖-做得好

translation.en: It really didn't even hurt. It was kind of like a bee sting.
translation.zh: 一点也不痛 像蜂蜇

translation.en: What a brave firefighter.
The doctors tell me Rodney is going to be okay, just a flesh wound.
translation.zh: 医生说朗尼伤势无碍 只是皮外伤

translation.en: A true blue Boston hero. Back to you, Don.
translation.zh: 波士顿真汉子 交回阿当

translation.en: That, right there, is what everybody wants.
translation.zh: 就是这东西 人人都想得到它

translation.en: A Burger King toy?
Open it up.
It's warm. What is it?
A battery.
A battery?
It's code-named Zephyr. Not your average Duracell.
translation.zh: 代号微风 不是一般金霸王

translation.en: It's high output. Never runs out.
translation.zh: 高输出量 永不耗尽

translation.en: What do you mean, "never"?
That little thing there is the first perpetual energy source since the sun.
translation.zh: 这小东西 是首种除太阳外 永不耗尽的能源

translation.en: So, what, your flashlight never runs out of juice? (CHUCKLES)
It can power a lot more than a flashlight, June.
Really? How much more? Mmm.
Small city.
Large submarine.
It's big.
The guy who invented it
is barely out of high school.
Simon Feck.
I was assigned with another agent to watch him at a facility, a lab in Wichita.
translation.zh: 我和另一人被派往威奇塔保护他

translation.en: And the other guy, the agent, is the guy who picked you up this morning.
translation.zh: 那人 那密探 就是今早找你那人

translation.en: Fitzgerald.
A couple of weeks ago, I found out he was going to sell the battery
translation.zh: 几星期前 我发现… 他想杀死赛蒙 卖掉那电池

translation.en: and kill Simon.
translation.zh: 他想杀死赛蒙 卖掉那电池

translation.en: So I got Simon out of there,
put him someplace safe and went back for the battery.
translation.zh: 安置好他后再回去取电池

translation.en: Fitz set me up. Made it look like I went rogue.
translation.zh: 但菲茨 他陷害我 令我变成坏蛋

translation.en: That's when I met you.
So, what's next? I mean, what's the plan?
I think we get some rest,
pick up Simon, and get you back for your sister's wedding.
translation.zh: 接赛蒙 再送你回你妹的婚礼

translation.en: I'm pretty good at what I do, June.
And tonight, we're safe.
Scout's honor.
Safe and secure?
Good night, Roy.
Were you really a Boy Scout?
Eagle Scout.
I was a Brownie.
That's cool. Mmm.
(WHISPERS) Good night, Roy.
MILLER: Pies for everybody. Everybody.
translation.zh: 免费薄饼 人人有份

translation.en: Everybody gets pies, okay? No ice cream...
translation.zh: 免费薄饼 人人有份 不要雪糕

translation.en: So, what do you think? Are we looking at another player?
translation.zh: 依你看 是否多了个玩家？

translation.en: We're looking at a pawn. I talked to her, so did he.
translation.zh: 只是棋子 我们跟她谈过

translation.en: She owns a garage, no passport, gone nowhere, been nowhere.
translation.zh: 她开汽车维修店没护照哪里也没去过

translation.en: She's a nobody.
You've been two steps behind since this began, Fitz.
translation.zh: 目前你处于下风 菲茨

translation.en: Are you sure someone is not taking you to school?
Clean this shit up.
This is a safe house?
Simon!
Simon?
Stay close.
Hey, Simon, this is no time to play.
♪ You can't escape my eyes
What is all this?
Simon. It's what he does.
I'm late, and he's gone.
♪ Don't lie when you're hurting inside
(SOFTLY) Simon.
♪ Why you try to put up a front for me
Hmm. "Made in Austria."
Who are these people? Are they Fitzgerald's guys?
No, it's other guys.
translation.zh: 他们是谁？菲茨的人马？ 不 另一帮

translation.en: Other bad guys?
Worse guys. Hold my mags.
Worse guys?
Now, I need you to listen carefully. Do exactly as I say.
translation.zh: 小心听好 照足我说的去做

translation.en: On three, I'm gonna lay down cover,
then we're gonna run to those shelves over there.
Okay.
Okay? Yeah.
You ready? Yeah.
Oh, my God!
Sorry. I panicked.
What number would you like?
Let's just stick with three, it's good.
Okay. One... Two...
Three.
These guys are fancy. Mags.
Could be Antonio Quintana's men.
He's a Spanish arms dealer.
He also wants the battery.
Ready? Uh-huh.
Let's move. Okay.
June. June!
How the hell are we gonna get out of here?
And where the hell is Simon?
I don't know yet, but he left a message.
A message? Wait.
What I need you to do right now is wait here.
What? Yeah. I'm gonna find us a way out.
I can't wait here! I'll be right back.
Wait! Roy!
Just take this.
(WHISPERING) Roy?
June?
(SCREAMING) June! June! June! June!
June! June! June! June!
June!
Please stop saying my name.
You keep saying my name, it's freaking me out.
Okay. I understand. Okay.
Drink this. What is it?
Brotine-zero. They're gonna smoke us with D-5.
translation.zh: 解药 他们会放毒气

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
Where's yours?
Oh, shit.
I'm sorry. Oh, no.
They're coming.
(WHISPERING) June.
I know this looks bad,
but we'll be out of here
in a couple of minutes. I got this.
translation.zh: 可以逃走 我搞得掂

translation.en: We gotta go, June. Here, I'll help you.
translation.zh: 走吧 茱恩 我来帮你

translation.en: (SHOUTING) We've been hit!
But it's okay!
We get through this, we're home free!
Ready, set, go!
We're almost there.
Hey, there, sleepy head.
How long have I been out?
Eighteen hours.
Where am I?
My place.
We're off-grid.
No one's ever found me here.
Shame we can't stay longer. We got a rendezvous with Simon.
translation.zh: 可惜不能久留 约了赛蒙

translation.en: He's fine. I figured out his code.
He's crazy about trains.
He used the passport I gave him and went to Austria.
translation.zh: 用我给他的护照 去了奥地利

translation.en: You drugged me again, Roy.
Yeah.
You can't do that.
Well, you weren't coping well.
I'm not sure, if you were awake, if they would've even let you live.
translation.zh: 醒的话 他们也未必放过你

translation.en: What am I wearing?
A bikini. We're in the tropics.
How did I get in the bikini?
June, I've been trained to dismantle a bomb in the pitch black
translation.zh: 茱恩 我可以在漆黑中 凭一支扣针及口香糖拆炸弹

translation.en: with nothing but a safety pin and a Junior Mint.
translation.zh: 凭一支扣针及口香糖拆炸弹

translation.en: I think I can get you in and out of some clothes without
looking.
I'm not saying that's what I did, but...
translation.zh: 不代表我会那样做 但…

translation.en: (GRUNTS) Okay. Sorry. Reflex.
I deserved that. Hit me again.
I won't stop you.
June.
June?
June!
...paper clips and Junior Mints...
"Not that I'm saying that's what I did."
Shit!
Is this his phone?
Movement alert.
Amapola.
That's a '67 Grand Prix.
I thought we were off the grid.
April.
April?
April! I know! No, I'm okay!
Listen, April... April? April?
April, can you hear me? April!
translation.zh: 喂 爱普？听到吗？爱普？

translation.en: April, can you...
JUNE ON RECORDING: I know! No, I'm okay! Listen, April... April?
April, can you hear me? April!
translation.zh: 我没事！听着喂？听到吗？ 米勒搞什么？

translation.en: (SPEAKING SPANISH)
We don't know, Antonio.
We traced her phone to the Azores. We're in range now.
translation.zh: 不知道 安东尼 追踪她手机至亚述尔群岛 在射程内

translation.en: Get to them before the agency.
Perfect timing. Lunch is ready.
translation.zh: 来得好 午餐准备好

translation.en: You must be thirsty.
translation.zh: 午餐准备好 一定很口渴

translation.en: It's coconut. It's loaded with electrolytes.
translation.zh: 椰子 含丰富电解质

translation.en: Just... Whoa. Okay?
Okay. Just... Whoa.
(GRUNTS) Yeah!
Hey. You got skills.
My dad wanted boys. Yeah?
Let me go.
You can get out anytime you want.
I'll show you.
Hands like Houdini.
Turn your palms down,
and all at once,
throw your hands to the ground and your hips back.
translation.zh: 向地猛抓 屁股一撞

translation.en: Nice.
That was good.
Who are you?
Really.
I don't understand.
Follow me.
I don't understand. I came in clean.
My phone is secure. It's secure. Unless you made a call.
translation.zh: 手机线路安全 除非你打过

translation.en: And you didn't make a call.
translation.zh: 手机线路安全 除非你打过 -但你没打-对 没打

translation.en: No, I didn't make a call.
I took a call.
You took a call?
It was a quick one.
You...
Come on.
JUNE: I thought we were off the grid, and then the phone rang. It's okay.
translation.zh: -以为收不到 谁知响了-没事

translation.en: It was my sister and I had to take the call.
translation.zh: -以为收不到 谁知响了-没事 -是妹妹 一定要接-小心

translation.en: You know? I didn't want her to worry. Watch your step.
translation.zh: -是妹妹 一定要接-小心 -怕她担心-集中

translation.en: No, no, no...
I can't get into that. I just can't get into that thing.
translation.zh: 不 我不坐 我不能坐那

translation.en: I can't get into that.
June. Roy...
Just, please, knock me out. Use broton-seven or whatever.
translation.zh: 请弄晕我 下药什么都好…

translation.en: It's okay. You're grabbing my neck.
You asked me not to drug you.
Okay, good.
(GROGGILY) Hands like Houdini. Hands...
Roy?
(WHOOPING)
I can't feel my face! MILLER: Okay, time.
Okay, Simon... (TRAIN HORN BLARING)
Roy, the pull on this thing...
We said 10 minutes. The traction on this thing.
It can pull up to 50,000 metric tons! I get it.
translation.zh: 可高达五万吨！ 明白

translation.en: (BOTH SPEAKING GERMAN)
translation.zh: 这是液压的吧？ -柴油压！-柴油压！

translation.en: It's a diesel hydraulic!
Don't you wanna see your Zephyr?
Yes.
Excuse me. Guten Morgen, miss.
Can you tell me where we are?
Right now, miss? We are in Austria.
translation.zh: 我们在哪？ 这儿？奥地利

translation.en: Austria, huh?
Would you like some breakfast, miss?
Yeah, that would be great. Thanks.
Okay, I'm gonna have some pancakes, scrambled eggs...
Scrambled eggs. ...and...
translation.zh: 我想要薄饼 炒蛋 炒蛋

translation.en: With a glass of milk.
And a glass of milk.
Can I get a Harvey Wallbanger, please?
Certainly, sir. (CELL PHONE RINGING)
You know, statistically, you're a lot more likely to die riding on a train
translation.zh: 据统计 火车是所有交通工具中

translation.en: than any other form of transportation.
10.3 times more likely than dying on a plane.
Simon?
(WHISPERING) Simon Feck?
(HESITANTLY) Yes.
